text:
RepoPulse forecast (7-day breakout watchlist)

Method: reproducible baseline model using public GitHub signals (no LLM).
Breakout = +max(200 stars, +50%) within 7 days.

1) muratcankoylan/Agent-Skills-for-Context-Engineering | 93% | stars now 1170 → est 4607 (range 4582-4632)
   https://github.com/muratcankoylan/Agent-Skills-for-Context-Engineering
2) bellard/mquickjs | 93% | stars now 1806 → est 11589 (range 11564-11614)
   https://github.com/bellard/mquickjs
3) journey-ad/gemini-watermark-remover | 90% | stars now 1067 → est 3132 (range 3107-3157)
   https://github.com/journey-ad/gemini-watermark-remover
4) MineDojo/NitroGen | 89% | stars now 857 → est 2061 (range 2036-2086)
   https://github.com/MineDojo/NitroGen
5) gemini-cli-extensions/conductor | 88% | stars now 806 → est 1847 (range 1822-1872)
   https://github.com/gemini-cli-extensions/conductor

Daily forecasts are logged publicly, then scored 7 days later (hits, misses, calibration).
#opensource #software #datascience #forecasting #github
